name: Cheesy Chicken Broccoli Casserole
ingredients: 8 ounces frozen broccoli cuts or florets, cooked and drained well
1/2 teaspoon chicken bouillon granules dissolved in 1/4 cup hot water
4 pieces bacon, chopped and fried until crisp

instructions.en: Put chicken in greased casserole; season with salt and pepper.
Top with broccoli; season with salt and pepper.
Whisk together sour cream, mayonnaise, bouillon mixture and garlic powder; pour over broccoli.
Top with cheese and sprinkle with bacon.
Bake at 350ยบ for 25 minutes until hot and bubbly.
